wordpressPost.title: Six Most Impactful WeSpire Users
wordpressPost.content:
As we reflect back on 2016, we’re taking the time to celebrate all of our users who have taken action to help create a more sustainable world. We’d especially like to recognize six of our super users who have harnessed the power of the WeSpire platform.

These six users have collectively earned over 1,930,885 points on our platform and performed more than 120 volunteers hours.

Here’s a closer look at the impact that users have made:

  1. A user from one of the world’s largest resort-casino organizations saved 39,718 lbs of emissions, enough to take 4 cars off the road for an entire year.
  2. At a multinational computer data storage company, one user saved 3,660 gallons of fuel, enough to move a 10k ton freight train 171 miles.
  3. A user from one of the world’s largest casino-entertainment companies saved 291,394 kWh of energy, enough to power NYC for nearly three minutes.
  4. At a national insurance company, one savvy user saved 9,852 gallons of water, enough to fill 352 bathtubs.
  5. One super user from a large, American telecommunications company saved 500 reams of copy paper, saving over 30 trees.
  6. Another user from one of the world’s largest resort-casino organizations saved 51,654 lbs of waste, enough to fill 23 dumpsters.

Here is the very impressive collective impact, made at work and at home, from these six users.

Looking to make an impact of your own? Here are a few simple actions you can take today.
